user_query: Summarize Cloud Computing Unit two went into email.
ai_response: Hey there!  Unit 2 of your Cloud Computing course focused on virtual machines (VMs) and virtualization.  It covered how VMs work, different ways to implement virtualization (like at the instruction set, hardware, operating system, library, or application levels), and how virtualization helps improve resource sharing and computer performance in clusters and data centers.  Basically, it's all about making your hardware work more efficiently by running multiple virtual computers on it.
